Title: Relates to the establishment of rates of payment for medical assistance for needy persons
Summary: Requires the commissioner of health to set rates of payment for medical assistance for needy persons to reflect more current base year information.
LawCode: Amd §§2807 & 2807-c, Pub Health L; amd §364-j, add §363-g, Soc Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law and the social services law, in relation to rates of payment for services under medical assistance to needy persons
